creator: Alohi SA
descriptionHtml:
FAX.PLUS - Best Rated Online Fax Service to send and receive fax from Android phone or tablet. It’s easy, fast, reliable, and secure.
With FAX.PLUS you can securely send free fax from your Android phone and receive faxes in your encrypted archive. First 10 pages are free.

★ FAX.PLUS recognized as the best online fax service! ★

Send fax from phone: FAX.PLUS Android app enables you to send faxes from anywhere, anytime and from any device without the need to have a fax machine, landline phone service, or any other specific equipment. To prepare the documents, you can either use the phone’s camera to scan documents or import the documents from local storage or cloud storage such as Google Drive or Dropbox.

Receive fax in your phone: You can get a dedicated fax number from over 40 countries to receive fax online on your Android phone. You will be notified with a push notification when there is new fax in your inbox.

Encrypted archive: All sent and received faxes are stored in a fully encrypted archive for your future reference.

Sign documents on the go: The electronic signature feature makes it easier than ever to sign documents and fax them back without even printing a single page.

Scan documents with mobile camera: Our free and secure online faxing solution gets the most out of your device’s camera and scans your physical documents and turn them into fax-ready documents. Automatic document detection, border cropping, and perspective correctness are some of the features of our powerful scanner.

HIPAA compliance: Activate advanced security controls and start faxing online with ease while staying fully compliant with HIPAA.


FAX.PLUS features and advantages:

• Send and receive faxes anytime and anywhere
• Send fax from email
• HIPAA Compliant faxing *
• Programmable fax API
• Cross-platform faxing solution
• Scan documents with your mobile camera (automatic document detection, magnifier, border cropping, perspective correctness)
• Add documents from your device or your cloud storage (Google Drive and Dropbox)
• Add a cover page to your fax with ‘Add Text’ feature
• Support many document formats: Office documents, PDF, JPG, PNG, TIFF
• Sign your documents and faxes and send them back without printing them
• Forward, reply or resend your faxes to any fax machine
• Send fax to your contacts
• Organize your fax archive by adding notes to your sent and received faxes
• Schedule your fax to be sent at a defined date and time
• Enable the Retry for failed faxes to ensure maximum delivery rate.
• Receive notification of your sent and received faxes to your email address. Add up to 5 emails.
• Send fax to a Human-Operated Telefax: Your destination contact will hear a prerecorded message stating: "This is a fax call, to receive please press start."

Worldwide coverage:
You can send faxes locally and internationally to more than 180 countries! And if you need to receive faxes, you can get a number from the United States, Canada, South Africa, Portugal, Germany, and many more countries. Check the list of 40+ locations currently available on our website.

FAX.PLUS pricing and plans:
FAX.PLUS provides a free plan that allows you to fax up to 10 pages!
Entrepreneur, Professional or Company? Take a look at our range of plans to find the one that fits you best! Our range of plans start at $4.99 / month and allows you to get a local fax number from over 40 countries from which you can receive and send faxes to over 180 countries.
https://www.fax.plus/pricing.

* FAX.PLUS is HIPAA compliant, provided the user has advanced security controls activated and enters into a business associate agreement (BAA) with FAX.PLUS. Advanced security controls are available on the Enterprise plan tier.

Any further questions or requests? Do not hesitate to reach us on our website, app or by email at support@fax.plus. Our customer support team will be pleased to help you!

With FAX.PLUS you can securely send free fax from your Android phone and receive faxes in your encrypted archive. First 10 pages are free.

★ FAX.PLUS recognized as the best online fax service! ★

Send fax from phone: FAX.PLUS Android app enables you to send faxes from anywhere, anytime and from any device without the need to have a fax machine, landline phone service, or any other specific equipment. To prepare the documents, you can either use the phone’s camera to scan documents or import the documents from local storage or cloud storage such as Google Drive or Dropbox.

Receive fax in your phone: You can get a dedicated fax number from over 40 countries to receive fax online on your Android phone. You will be notified with a push notification when there is new fax in your inbox.

Encrypted archive: All sent and received faxes are stored in a fully encrypted archive for your future reference.

Sign documents on the go: The electronic signature feature makes it easier than ever to sign documents and fax them back without even printing a single page.

Scan documents with mobile camera: Our free and secure online faxing solution gets the most out of your device’s camera and scans your physical documents and turn them into fax-ready documents. Automatic document detection, border cropping, and perspective correctness are some of the features of our powerful scanner.

HIPAA compliance: Activate advanced security controls and start faxing online with ease while staying fully compliant with HIPAA.


FAX.PLUS features and advantages:

• Send and receive faxes anytime and anywhere
• Send fax from email
• HIPAA Compliant faxing *
• Programmable fax API
• Cross-platform faxing solution
• Scan documents with your mobile camera (automatic document detection, magnifier, border cropping, perspective correctness)
• Add documents from your device or your cloud storage (Google Drive and Dropbox)
• Add a cover page to your fax with ‘Add Text’ feature
• Support many document formats: Office documents, PDF, JPG, PNG, TIFF
• Sign your documents and faxes and send them back without printing them
• Forward, reply or resend your faxes to any fax machine
• Send fax to your contacts
• Organize your fax archive by adding notes to your sent and received faxes
• Schedule your fax to be sent at a defined date and time
• Enable the Retry for failed faxes to ensure maximum delivery rate.
• Receive notification of your sent and received faxes to your email address. Add up to 5 emails.
• Send fax to a Human-Operated Telefax: Your destination contact will hear a prerecorded message stating: "This is a fax call, to receive please press start."

Worldwide coverage:
You can send faxes locally and internationally to more than 180 countries! And if you need to receive faxes, you can get a number from the United States, Canada, South Africa, Portugal, Germany, and many more countries. Check the list of 40+ locations currently available on our website.

FAX.PLUS pricing and plans:
FAX.PLUS provides a free plan that allows you to fax up to 10 pages!
Entrepreneur, Professional or Company? Take a look at our range of plans to find the one that fits you best! Our range of plans start at $4.99 / month and allows you to get a local fax number from over 40 countries from which you can receive and send faxes to over 180 countries.
https://www.fax.plus/pricing.

* FAX.PLUS is HIPAA compliant, provided the user has advanced security controls activated and enters into a business associate agreement (BAA) with FAX.PLUS. Advanced security controls are available on the Enterprise plan tier.

Any further questions or requests? Do not hesitate to reach us on our website, app or by email at support@fax.plus. Our customer support team will be pleased to help you!

Scan documents with mobile camera: Our free and secure online faxing solution gets the most out of your device’s camera and scans your physical documents and turn them into fax-ready documents. Automatic document detection, border cropping, and perspective correctness are some of the features of our powerful scanner.

HIPAA compliance: Activate advanced security controls and start faxing online with ease while staying fully compliant with HIPAA.


Fax.Plus features and advantages:

• Send and receive faxes anytime and anywhere
• Send fax from email
• HIPAA Compliant faxing *
• Programmable fax API
• Cross-platform faxing solution
• Scan documents with your mobile camera (automatic document detection, magnifier, border cropping, perspective correctness)
• Add documents from your device or your cloud storage (Google Drive and Dropbox)
• Add a cover page to your fax with ‘Add Text’ feature
• Support many document formats: Office documents, PDF, JPG, PNG, TIFF
• Sign your documents and faxes and send them back without printing them
• Forward, reply or resend your faxes to any fax machine
• Send fax to your contacts
• Organize your fax archive by adding notes to your sent and received faxes
• Schedule your fax to be sent at a defined date and time
• Enable the Retry for failed faxes to ensure maximum delivery rate.
• Receive notification of your sent and received faxes to your email address. Add up to 5 emails.
• Send fax to a Human-Operated Telefax: Your destination contact will hear a prerecorded message stating: "This is a fax call, to receive please press start."

Worldwide coverage:
You can send faxes locally and internationally to more than 180 countries! And if you need to receive faxes, you can get a number from the United States, Canada, South Africa, Portugal, Germany, and many more countries. Check the list of 40+ locations currently available on our website.

Fax.Plus pricing and plans:
Fax.Plus provides a free plan that allows you to fax up to 10 pages!
Entrepreneur, Professional or Company? Take a look at our range of plans to find the one that fits you best! Our range of plans start at $6.99 / month and allows you to get a local fax number from over 40 countries from which you can receive and send faxes to over 180 countries.
https://www.fax.plus/pricing.

* Fax.Plus is HIPAA compliant, provided the user has advanced security controls activated and enters into a business associate agreement (BAA) with Fax.Plus. Advanced security controls are available on the Enterprise plan tier.

Any further questions or requests? Do not hesitate to reach us on our website, app or by email at support@fax.plus. Our customer support team will be pleased to help you!
